snippet.title: NEW TRAILER The Grass of Genesis | First Gameplay in Unreal Engine 5 HD 4K 2023
snippet.description:
WELL-LINK has announced China's first cinematic graphic game that is entirely cloud-based, The Grass of Genesis, developed with Unreal Engine 5. The game is very similar to Tomb Raider. The company is known for collaborating in the cloud version of Genshin Impact.

The Grass of Genesis has a storage of 10G resources per minute on the cloud service and achieves 8K resolution, 120hz refresh rate, with Dolby surround sound. Impressive Graphics with advanced real-time cloud rendering technology!

00:00 The Grass of Genesis - Tech Demo in Unreal Engine 5
12:04 The Grass of Genesis - Motion Capture in Unreal Engine 5

#ue5 #unrealengine #unrealengine5
